name: Pork Steak
steps: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Season pork steaks with salt and black pepper.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add pork steaks and cook until browned on both sides, about 3 minutes per side.
Transfer pork steaks to a baking dish and bake in preheated oven until cooked through, about 10-15 minutes.
